name: Blackbird Simulator
description:
Role play a Blackbird :)

3D REAL SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive and protect yourself in the forest!

NEW CRAFT MISSIONS - Collect insects and bugs to craft new flowers and plants for the forest.

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such wild bears, wolves, foxes, and rabbits! Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous forest!

CREATE A BLACKBIRD PACK - Create, unlock, and raise a pack of Blackbirds to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies.

BE A REAL-LIFE BLACKBIRD - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this forest by searching for food, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey!

GAIN A BLACKBIRD PERSPECTIVE - Easy controls so you can live your life as a Blackbird! Zoom in and out to accomplish your Blackbird missions! Hunt prey to gain energy and experience points!

This game features:
NEW CRAFT MISSIONS
3D REAL SIMULATOR
EPIC BATTLES
BLACKBIRD PACKS
HUNTING WILD BEARS, WOLVES, FOXES, and RABBITS
COLLECTING DIFFERENT COLORED GEMS FOR ENERGY POINTS
AWESOME HIGH-DEFINITION GRAPHICS
ESCAPING FROM WILD PREDATORS OUT TO DESTROY YOU
STRUGGLING TO SURVIVE IN AN UNKNOWN FOREST
3D WORLD TO DISCOVER AND EXPLORE

Role play a REAL LIVE BLACKBIRD BIRD!
